Lead Training

An EPA/HUD RRP Certificate is required for all rehab and lead jobs.

To get an RRP license, you must attend a class by a state-certified lead instructor.

View a list of accredited Tennessee lead trainers.

To request classes, email Kenneth Bakari at kennethbakari@phaseoneconsultants.com.

Class Locations

Class Costs

Registration Fee is $25 if you pre-register or $50 the day of class.

RRP $395 $295
LBP Supervisor $895 $395
LBP Worker $495 $325
LBP Inspector $795 $425
LBP Risk Assessor $595 $325
LBP Project Designer NA $495

Registration

Training Reimbursement

The SCDH has some funding available for partial reimbursement for Section 3 contractors.

To be reimbursed for training, contact Anita Tate at anita.tate@shelbycountytn.gov.
